description: A simple clay pot for basic cooking. Reduces cooking cooldown by 5%.

description: A sturdy iron skillet. Unlocks common and uncommon recipes; reduces cooking cooldown by 10%.

description: A quality copper pan. Unlocks up to rare recipes; reduces cooking cooldown by 15%.

name: Basic Bait
description: Simple worms and insects. 1.2x rare fish boost with 80% success rate.

description: Quality bait with special ingredients. 1.5x rare fish boost with 60% success rate.

name: Magic Bait
description: Enchanted bait that attracts rare fish. 2.0x rare fish boost with 40% success rate.

name: Epic Bait
description: Legendary bait crafted from rare materials. 3.0x rare fish boost with 25% success rate.

name: Legendary Bait
description: The ultimate bait, said to attract mythical creatures. 5.0x rare fish boost with 15% success rate.

name: Mythic Bait
description: Bait crafted from the essence of ancient sea gods. 7.0x rare fish boost with 10% success rate.

name: Spark of Wisdom
description: Get 2x XP for 1 hour

description: Get 2x XP for 24 hours

description: Double your daily rewards for 1 hour

name: Fortune Surge

description: Increases work rewards by 1.5x for 1 hour

description: Increases work rewards by 2x for 2 hours
